subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: What was the main occupation of people in the Vedic period?
question_hi: वैदिक काल में लोगों का मुख्य पेशा क्या था?
explanation_en: Farming was the main occupation of people in the Vedic period.
explanation_hi: वैदिक काल में कृषि लोगों का मुख्य पेशा था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: Who was the chief of the Vedic society?
question_hi: वैदिक समाज का मुख्य नेता कौन था?
explanation_en: Gramani was the chief of the Vedic society.
explanation_hi: वैदिक समाज का मुख्य नेता ग्रामणी था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: What was the name of the Vedic ritual in which animals were sacrificed?
question_hi: वैदिक काल में जानवरों की क्रिया में क्या नाम था?
explanation_en: Ashvamedha was the Vedic ritual in which animals were sacrificed.
explanation_hi: वैदिक काल में जानवरों की क्रिया अश्वमेध थी।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: Who was the Vedic god of fire?
explanation_en: Agni was the Vedic god of fire.

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: What was the name of the Vedic social class that did not own land?
question_hi: वैदिक समाज में जो वर्ग था जिसने भूमि नहीं खरीदी थी?
explanation_en: Shudra was the Vedic social class that did not own land.
explanation_hi: वैदिक समाज में शूद्र वर्ग ने भूमि नहीं खरीदी थी।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: What was the main source of water in the Vedic period?
question_hi: वैदिक काल में जल का मुख्य स्रोत क्या था?
explanation_en: River was the main source of water in the Vedic period.
explanation_hi: वैदिक काल में नदी जल का मुख्य स्रोत था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: Who was the Vedic god of war?
explanation_en: Indra was the Vedic god of war.

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: What was the name of the Vedic ritual in which the king was crowned?
question_hi: वैदिक काल में राजा की राजतिलक क्या नाम था?
explanation_en: Rajasuya was the Vedic ritual in which the king was crowned.
explanation_hi: वैदिक काल में राजा की राजतिलक राजसूय थी।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: Who was the Vedic god of the sky?

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: What was the name of the Vedic social class that did not have any property?
question_hi: वैदिक समाज में जो वर्ग था जिसके पास कोई संपत्ति नहीं थी?
explanation_en: Brahmin was the Vedic social class that did not have any property.
explanation_hi: वैदिक समाज में ब्राह्मण वर्ग के पास कोई संपत्ति नहीं थी।
